div.p: SECTION, in general, denotes a part of a divided thing, or the diviſion itſelf. Such, particularly, are the ſubdiviſions of a chapter; called alſo paragraphs and articles: the mark of a ſection is §.
Section, in geometry, denotes a ſide or ſurface of a body or figure cut off by another; or the place where lines, planes, &c. cut each other.
